DESCRIPTION:
Dishonored events occur in Danuolle - huge industrial metropolis in the streets which faced technology and mysticism. The main character - a bodyguard of the Empress, accused of murdering her client - as fate turns into a mysterious assassin, burying a person under the mask. From now on it - the shadow of the streets, tortured plague, living in fear of the government, unfathomable technology and otherworldly forces. The truth is dark as the water in the canals, ring contraction Danuoll. And life will never be the same again.
